Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="WdfDevice" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="SensorUsage" inType="win:UInt16" outType="win:HexInt16"/> <data name="ReportId" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="Usage" inType="win:UInt16" outType="win:HexInt16"/> <data name="fmtid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="pid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: [SensorsHid] Timestamp usage reported by Sensor=(%2) with ReportId=(%3) is ignored since it does not have right capabilities. (Expected Report Size=%4) (Actual Report Size=%5) (Expected Report Count=%6) (Actual Report Count=%7) (Expected Exponent=%8) (Actual Exponent=%9). WdfDevice=(%1)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="WdfDevice" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="SensorUsage" inType="win:UInt16" outType="win:HexInt16"/> <data name="ReportId" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="BitSize" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ExpectedBitSize" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ReportCount" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ExpectedReportCount" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="Exponent" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ExpectedExponent" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> </template>

Event.Message: [SensorsHid] Report Interval is supported by Sensor=(%2) with ReportId=(%3). WdfDevice=(%1)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="WdfDevice" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="SensorUsage" inType="win:UInt16" outType="win:HexInt16"/> <data name="ReportId" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="WdfDevice" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="SensorUsage" inType="win:UInt16" outType="win:HexInt16"/> <data name="ReportId" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> </template>

Event.Message: [SensorsHid] IsWakeReportingStateSupported=(%4) and IsWakePowerStateSupported=(%5). Wake is not supported by Sensor=(%2) with ReportId=(%3). WdfDevice=(%1)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="WdfDevice" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="SensorUsage" inType="win:UInt16" outType="win:HexInt16"/> <data name="ReportId" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="IsWakeReportingStateSupported" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="IsWakePowerStateSupported" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: [SensorsHid] Incorrect Report ID found in report (%2). WdfDevice=(%1)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="WdfDevice" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ReportIdInReport" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> </template>

Event.Message: [SensorsHid] Failed to get input report from Sensor=(%2) with ReportId=(%3) NTSTATUS=(%4). WdfDevice=(%1)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="WdfDevice" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="SensorUsage" inType="win:UInt16" outType="win:HexInt16"/> <data name="ReportId" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="NtStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: [SensorsHid] Failed to get feature report from Sensor=(%2) with ReportId=(%3) NTSTATUS=(%4). WdfDevice=(%1)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="WdfDevice" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="SensorUsage" inType="win:UInt16" outType="win:HexInt16"/> <data name="ReportId" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="NtStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: [SensorsHid] Failed to set feature report from Sensor=(%2) with ReportId=(%3) NTSTATUS=(%4). WdfDevice=(%1)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="WdfDevice" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="SensorUsage" inType="win:UInt16" outType="win:HexInt16"/> <data name="ReportId" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="NtStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Interface" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: [SensorsHid] Using Hardware Offloaded SDO=(%1) to create hardware SDO
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Interface" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: [SensorsHid] Removing SDO based on sensor=(%1)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Interface" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: [SensorService] New sensor selected for Instant On/Off with Interface=(%1), FriendlyName=(%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Interface" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FriendlyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: [SensorService] Sensor started for Instant On/Off with Interface=(%1) AbsoluteDistanceThreshold=(%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Interface" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="AbsoluteDistanceThreshold" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: [SensorService] Sensor stopped for Instant On/Off with Interface=(%1)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Interface" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: [SensorService] Sensor reported new data for Instant On/Off with Interface=(%1) IsValid=(%2) IsPresent=(%3) DetectedDistance=(%4)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Interface" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="IsValid" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="IsPresent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="DetectedDistance" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: [SensorService] Instant On/Off has signaled for wake/lock with SignalType=(%1)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SignalType" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: [SensorService] Instant On/Off setting has been changed by user with Setting=(%1) OldValue=(%2) NewValue=(%3)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Setting" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="OldValue" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NewValue" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
